mainPage.heroSectionTitle: Monitoring of projects for the creation and development of Kyrgyzstan's infrastructure
mainPage.heroSectionDescription: Up-to-date information on projects, funding, and implementation
mainPage.mainBlockDescription: The AIDSTAT project aims to create a monitoring system for investments and government expenditures in the Kyrgyz Republic. By using digital technologies, the project will ensure transparency and efficiency in public financial management. AIDSTAT will allow tracking investment processes in real-time, improving control over spending, and supporting informed decision-making. The goal is to increase accountability and provide citizens with access to information about government investments.

projectsPage.title: Projects
projectsPage.description: Explore our projects, learn about their goals, implementation stages, and impact on society. Let's make Kyrgyzstan even better together!

partnersPage.title: Partners
partnersPage.description: This section provides information about projects and programs supported by donors, as well as their impact on the economic and social progress of the country.

agenciesPage.title: Agencies
agenciesPage.description: This section provides information about the executive agencies involved in the implementation of projects and programs, as well as their contribution to sustainable development and enhancing the effectiveness of ongoing initiatives.

documentsPage.description: Centralized access to important documents and legal acts concerning various aspects of life and activities in Kyrgyzstan.
